title: Encyclopedia of social work with groups
subject: Social group work$$QSocial group work -- Encyclopedias
POLITICAL SCIENCE -- Public Policy -- Social Services & Welfare
SOCIAL SCIENCE -- Human Services
Social group work
description: What do you have to know, today, to be an effective group worker and what are the different group work approaches? With 110 articles and entries, this book provides a comprehensive overview of social work with groups from its initial development to its astounding range of diverse practice today with many populations in different places.
contents: Group Work History: Past, Present and Future -- Canada / Nancy E. Sullivan, Ellen Sue Mesbur, and Norma C. Lang -- United States / Albert S. Alissi -- Jane Addams / Judith A.B. Lee -- Grace Longwell Coyle / David S. Crampton -- The Association for the Advancement of Social Work with Groups, Inc., an international professional organization (AASWG) / John H. Ramey -- Summer Camps / Meryl Nadel and Susan Scher -- Contemporary landscape -/ Harriet Goodman -- Struggle for survival / Shirley R. Simon and Joyce A. Webster -- Group Work Values -- Humanistic and democratic values / Urania Glassman -- Social context / Maura McIntyre and Lynne Mitchell -- Group Work Major Models -- Cognitive-behavioral / Randy Magen -- Empowerment model / Rhonda E. Hudson -- Mutual aid model / Dominique Moyse Steinberg -- Psychodynamic model / Carol Tasone -- Task-centered model / Charles D. Garvin -- Group Work Approaches and Methods -- Activity: history / Maxine Lynn and Dannielle Nisivoccia -- Activity: use and selection / Edna Comer and Kasumi Hirayama -- Activity therapy for children / Lorraine R. Tempel -- Anti-oppressive practice / Izumi Sakamoto -- Curricular-based approach / Joan Letendre -- Emergency crisis interventions / Ogden Rogers -- Family involvement approach / David S. Crampton -- Intergroup dialogue: introduction / Nancy Rodenborg and Lois A. Bosch -- Intergroup dialogue: principles / Mona C.S. Schatz -- Multiple family approach / Geetha Gopalan and Lydia Franco -- Needs acquisition and behavior change approach / Tom Caplan -- Psychoeducational approach / Lynn Turner -- Self-directed approach / Audrey Mullender and David Ward -- Sprituality / Carlean Gilbert -- Systemic approach / Oded Manor.

Group Stages of Development -- Boston Model / Francis Bartolomeo -- Relational Model / Linda Yael Schiller -- Group Work Phases of Helping -- Preliminary phase / Lawrence Shulman -- Beginning phase / Lawrence Shulman -- Middle phase / Hal Lipton -- Sessional Endings / Martin L. Birnbaum and Andrew Cicchetti -- Termination phase / Steven Rose -- Group Work Education -- Field instruction / Carol S. Cohen and Julianne Wayne -- Use of literature in Teaching -- Dana Grossman Leeman -- Use of technology in teaching / Shirley R. Simon and Kathleen W. Stauber -- Group Work Research -- Evidence-based group work / Mark J. Macgowan -- Focus group / Lawrence C. Shulman and Michelle G. Shedlin -- Intervention Research / Maeda J. Galinsky and Mark W. Fraser -- Measurement / Mark J. Macgowan -- Quantitative and qualitative methods / Varsha Pandya -- SYMLOG / Saul S. Kutner, and Ruth D. Kirsch -- Group Work Journals -- Groupwork / Mark Doel -- Small group research / Aaron M. Brower, Charels D. Garvin, and Richard Kettner-Polley -- Social work with groups / Andrew Malekoff -- Group Work in Fields of Practice -- Community settings for adolescents / Maryanne Sabatino -- Corrections / Karen Green and Robert Green -- Family and children's services / Mary Pender Greene -- Foster care / Michael Wagner -- The homeless / Sarah Stevenson -- Partial hospitalization / Gilan Miller-Gertz and Nancy L. Herron -- Residential care settings for adolescents / Francis Bartolomeo -- Schools / Steven Rose.

Clifford -- Adults with co-occurring mental health and substance abuse problems / Brian E. Perron and Kimberly Bender -- Adult survivors of childhood sexual abuse / Carolyn Knight -- Blind adults / Faith Fogelman -- Children with traumatic grief / Alison Salloum -- Domestic violence survivors / Patricia O'Brien -- Family violence survivors / Wendy Bunston -- Lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender individuals / Mitch Rosenwald -- Nonresidential fathers / Glenn Stone -- Parents / Janet Seden -- People with AIDS / George S. Getzel -- People with cancer / Rachel M. Schneider -- People with mental health problems / Kathi R. Trawver -- People with problematic alcohol use / Meredith Hanson -- People with problematic alcohol use and their children / Neta Peleg-Oren -- People with problematic substance use -- Adults / Andrew Cicchetti -- People with problematic substance use -- older adults / Loretta Hartley-Bangs -- People with problematic substance use -- in crisis / Leslie Temme and Maurice Lacey -- Police officers / George T. Patterson and Grace A. Telesco -- Police officers and their spouses / Linda Openshaw -- Rape survivors / Shantih E. Clemans -- Sexual offenders / Steven Hartsock and Karen Harper-Dorton -- Siblings of children with autistic spectrum disorders / David Strauss and Daniel Aaron -- Street youth / Steve Kraft -- Trauma survivors / Carolyn Knight -- Women with advanced breast cancer / Fiona McDermott and Christine Hill -- Youth at risk / Sam Copeland -- Group Work Over the Life Course -- Children / Carolyn Knight -- Adolescents / Andrew Malekoff -- Adults / Esta Glazer-Semmel -- Older adults / Ronald W. Toseland -- Transgenerational relationships / Scott P. Anstadt -- End-of-life care / Daniel Liechty.

Group Work and Community Context -- Coalitions / Donna McIntosh and Margo Hirsch -- Community change / Mark Chupp -- Rural regions / Michael Kim Zapf -- Social Action / Jennie Fleming -- Social capital / Paul Abels and Sonia Leib Abels -- Group Work and Organizational Context -- Interdisciplinary teams / Laura Bronstein and Julie S. Abramson -- Involuntary clients (change processes) / Michael Chovanec -- Involuntary clients (engagement process) / Kay Goler Levin -- Vicarious Traumatization / Shantih E. Clemans -- Work groups / Paul H. Ephross and Thomas V. Vassil -- Workplace coaching / Gregory J. Tully -- Group Work Leadership -- Co-leadership / Kathryn S. Collins and Marceline M. Lazzari -- Co-working / Mark Doel -- Leadership / Steven Rose -- Mentoring / Cheryl D. Lee and Eliette Montiel -- Group Work and Technology -- Online support / Andrés Arias Astray and Ana Barrón López de Roda -- Online groups / Brian E. Perron and Thomas J. Powell -- Telephone groups / Ronald W. Toseland.
